DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Dentate Nucleus Upper Extremity Hemiparesis Due Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study safety feasibility study intend provide preliminary data design future pilot study . The objective study document safety patient outcomes electrical stimulation dentate nucleus area management chronic , moderate severe upper extremity hemiparesis due ischemic stroke .
DOC.criteria: Key One stroke occur 12 year ago ( i.e . index stroke 1224 month ) Stroke due block blood vessel ( i.e . unilateral MCA stroke ) Severe weakness one arm ( i.e . unilateral upperextremity hemiparesis ) Key Seizures since time stroke ( i.e . seizure seizure disorder ) Unable MRI ( i.e . contraindicate MRI )
